segments.text: My wife and I are thinking about taking our parents with us on a vacation . Do you have any suggestion about where to go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The choice of destination is very important . It will too energetic for the old people if you make an excursion or go to climb mountains . But they'll be interested in going to the historical places of interest where they can have fun .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes what young people like is different from the old . Maybe we can go visit first and then do some shopping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a good idea . That will allow both you and your parents to enjoy yourselves .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What should we bring besides a change of clothes , money and some snacks ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's some medicine the doctor recommends . If you leave it at home , you will find it difficult to face up when the old people suffered a seizure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes ! I didn't think about that.Thank you for reminding me . How many days should we spend on a vacation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You'd better have all a light schedule . You can rest up for a few days if your parents find tired ã€‚
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems that good planning for a family vacation is important to make sure everyone will be happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that's right . Having an enjoyable time together is the goal .
segments.speaker: S2
